title: Salmon and asparagus terrine
description: This is such a stunningly good looking and tasty starter for a buffet, picnic or smart dinner party.  It looks as if you have spent ages preparing it, yet is very simple to make. Serve it with melba toast, oat cakes or a little salad. Equipment and preparation: you will need a 450g/1lb loaf tin.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
